_header: Ere ne couth I sorrow none
_description: The Prisoner’s Prayer — forty-four lines in stanzas of varying length, with their French equivalent (with music)

GuildhallLegibus.First Lines:
Ar ne kuth ich sorghe nonnu ich moot imane min
                    mon…
GuildhallLegibus.Last Lines: …that we mooten eye and ohabben the eeche blisse
